name: Yeenoghu
damage_immunities: bludgeoning, piercing, and slashing from nonmagical attacks

traits.Legendary Resistance (3/Day): If Yeenoghu fails a saving throw, he can choose to succeed instead.
traits.Magic Resistance: Yeenoghu has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.
traits.Rampage: When Yeenoghu reduces a creature to 0 hit points with a melee attack on his turn, Yeenoghu can take a bonus action to move up to half his speed and make a bite attack.

actions.Multiattack: Yeenoghu makes three flail attacks. If an attack hits, he can cause it to create an additional effect of his choice or at random (each effect can be used only once per Multiattack):
actions.Flail: Melee Weapon Attack: +16+1d14 + 9 to hit, reach 15 ft., one target. Hit: 15 (1d12 + 9) bludgeoning damage.
actions.Bite: Melee Weapon Attack: +16+1d14 + 9 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. Hit: 14 (1d10 + 9) piercing damage.

options.Charge: Yeenoghu moves up to his speed.
options.Swat Away: Yeenoghu makes a flail attack. If the attack hits, the target must succeed on a DC 24+1d14 + 17 Strength saving throw or be pushed 15 feet in a straight line away from Yeenoghu. If the saving throw fails by 5 or more, the target falls prone.
options.Savage (Costs 2 Actions): Yeenoghu makes a bite attack against each creature within 10 feet of him.

actions: Yeenoghu causes an iron spike - 5 feet tall and 1 inch in diameter - to burst from the ground at a point he can see within 100 feet of him. Any creature in the space where the spike emerges must make a DC 24+1d14 + 17 Dexterity saving throw. On a failed save, the creature takes 27 (6d8) piercing damage and is restrained by being impaled on the spike. A creature can use an action to remove itself (or a creature it can reach) from the spike, ending the restrained condition.
Each gnoll or hyena that Yeenoghu can see can use its reaction to move up to its speed.

Until the next initiative count 20, all gnolls and hyenas within the lair are enraged, causing them to have advantage on melee weapon attack rolls and causing attack rolls to have advantage against them.
